00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase;

00009 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;

00011 import java.util.*;
00012 import java.util.logging.Level;

00014 public class CreateTableStatement implements SqlStatement {
00015     private String schemaName;
00016     private String tableName;
00017     private String tablespace;
00018     private List<String> columns = new ArrayList<String>();
00019     private Set<String> autoIncrementColumns = new HashSet<String>();
00020     private Map<String, String> columnTypes = new HashMap<String, String>();
00021     private Map<String, String> defaultValues = new HashMap<String, String>();
00022 
00023     private PrimaryKeyConstraint primaryKeyConstraint;
00024     private Set<String> notNullColumns = new HashSet<String>();
00025     private Set<ForeignKeyConstraint> foreignKeyConstraints = new HashSet<ForeignKeyConstraint>();
00026     private Set<UniqueConstraint> uniqueConstraints = new HashSet<UniqueConstraint>();

00029     public CreateTableStatement(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00030         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00031         this.tableName = tableName;
00032     }

00073     public CreateTableStatement addPrimaryKeyColumn(String columnName, String columnType, String keyName, ColumnConstraint... constraints) {
00074 //        String pkName = "PK_" + getTableName().toUpperCase();
00078         PrimaryKeyConstraint pkConstraint = new PrimaryKeyConstraint(keyName);
00079         pkConstraint.addColumns(columnName);
00080 
00081         List<ColumnConstraint> allConstraints = new ArrayList<ColumnConstraint>();
00082         allConstraints.addAll(Arrays.asList(constraints));
00083         allConstraints.add(new NotNullConstraint(columnName));
00084         allConstraints.add(pkConstraint);
00085 
00086 
00087         addColumn(columnName, columnType, allConstraints.toArray(new ColumnConstraint[allConstraints.size()]));
00088 
00089         return this;
00090     }
00091 
00092     public CreateTableStatement addColumn(String columnName, String columnType) {
00093         return addColumn(columnName, columnType, null, new ColumnConstraint[0]);
00094     }
00095 
00096     public CreateTableStatement addColumn(String columnName, String columnType, String defaultValue) {
00097         return addColumn(columnName, columnType, defaultValue, new ColumnConstraint[0]);
00098     }
00099 
00100     public CreateTableStatement addColumn(String columnName, String columnType, ColumnConstraint... constraints) {
00101         return addColumn(columnName, columnType, null, constraints);
00102     }
00103 
00104     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00105         return true;
00106     }
00107 
00108     public CreateTableStatement addColumn(String columnName, String columnType, String defaultValue, ColumnConstraint... constraints) {
00109         this.getColumns().add(columnName);
00110         this.columnTypes.put(columnName, columnType);
00111         if (defaultValue != null) {
00112             defaultValues.put(columnName, defaultValue);
00113         }
00114         if (constraints != null) {
00115             for (ColumnConstraint constraint : constraints) {
00116                 if (constraint instanceof PrimaryKeyConstraint) {
00117                     if (this.getPrimaryKeyConstraint() == null) {
00118                         this.primaryKeyConstraint = (PrimaryKeyConstraint) constraint;
00119                     } else {
00120                         for (String column : ((PrimaryKeyConstraint) constraint).getColumns()) {
00121                             this.getPrimaryKeyConstraint().addColumns(column);
00122                         }
00123                     }
00124                 } else if (constraint instanceof NotNullConstraint) {
00125                     ((NotNullConstraint) constraint).setColumnName(columnName);
00126                     getNotNullColumns().add(columnName);
00127                 } else if (constraint instanceof ForeignKeyConstraint) {
00128                     ((ForeignKeyConstraint) constraint).setColumn(columnName);
00129                     getForeignKeyConstraints().add(((ForeignKeyConstraint) constraint));
00130                 } else if (constraint instanceof UniqueConstraint) {
00131                     ((UniqueConstraint) constraint).addColumns(columnName);
00132                     getUniqueConstraints().add(((UniqueConstraint) constraint));
00133                 } else if (constraint instanceof AutoIncrementConstraint) {
00134                     autoIncrementColumns.add(columnName);
00135                 } else {
00136                     throw new RuntimeException("Unknown constraint type: " + constraint.getClass().getName());
00137                 }
00138             }
00139         }
00140 
00141         return this;
00142     }
00143 
00144 
00145     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) {
00146 //        StringBuffer fkConstraints = new StringBuffer();
00147 
00148         StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00149         buffer.append("CREATE TABLE ").append(database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName())).append(" ");
00150         buffer.append("(");
00151         Iterator<String> columnIterator = getColumns().iterator();
00152         while (columnIterator.hasNext()) {
00153             String column = columnIterator.next();
00154             boolean isAutoIncrement = autoIncrementColumns.contains(column);
00155 
00156             buffer.append(database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), column));
00157             buffer.append(" ").append(database.getColumnType(columnTypes.get(column), isAutoIncrement));
00158 
00159             if ((database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) && 
00160                                         (getPrimaryKeyConstraint()!=null) &&
00161                                         (getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getColumns().size()==1) &&
00162                                         (getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getColumns().contains(column)) &&
00163                                         isAutoIncrement) {
00164                 String pkName = StringUtils.trimToNull(getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getConstraintName());
00165                     if (pkName == null) {
00166                         pkName = database.generatePrimaryKeyName(getTableName());
00167                     }
00168                     buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ");
00169                     buffer.append(database.escapeConstraintName(pkName));
00170                                 buffer.append(" PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT");
00171                         }
00172             
00173             if (getDefaultValue(column) != null) {
00174                 if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00175                     buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ").append(((MSSQLDatabase) database).generateDefaultConstraintName(tableName, column));
00176                 }
00177                 buffer.append(" DEFAULT ");
00178                 buffer.append(getDefaultValue(column));
00179             }
00180 
00181             if (isAutoIncrement &&
00182                                         (database.getAutoIncrementClause()!=null) &&
00183                                         (!database.getAutoIncrementClause().equals(""))) {
00184                 if (database.supportsAutoIncrement()) {
00185                     buffer.append(" ").append(database.getAutoIncrementClause()).append(" ");
00186                 } else {
00187                     LogFactory.getLogger().log(Level.WARNING, database.getProductName()+" does not support autoincrement columns as request for "+(database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName())));
00188                 }
00189             }
00190 
00191             if (getNotNullColumns().contains(column)) {
00192                 buffer.append(" NOT NULL");
00193             } else {
00194                 if (database instanceof SybaseDatabase) {
00195                     buffer.append(" NULL");
00196                 }
00197             }
00198 
00199             if (columnIterator.hasNext()) {
00200                 buffer.append(", ");
00201             }
00202         }
00203 
00204         buffer.append(",");
00205         
00206         if (!( (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) && 
00207                                 (getPrimaryKeyConstraint()!=null) &&
00208                                 (getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getColumns().size()==1) &&
00209                                 autoIncrementColumns.contains(getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getColumns().get(0)) )) {
00210                 // ...skip this code block for sqlite if a single column primary key
00211                 // with an autoincrement constraint exists.
00212                 // This constraint is added after the column type.
00213 
00214                 if (getPrimaryKeyConstraint() != null && getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getColumns().size() > 0) {
00215                     String pkName = StringUtils.trimToNull(getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getConstraintName());
00216                     if (pkName == null) {
00217                         pkName = database.generatePrimaryKeyName(getTableName());
00218                     }
00219                     buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ");
00220                     buffer.append(database.escapeConstraintName(pkName));
00221                     buffer.append(" PRIMARY KEY (");
00222                     buffer.append(database.escapeColumnNameList(StringUtils.join(getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getColumns(), ", ")));
00223                     buffer.append(")");
00224                     buffer.append(",");
00225                 }
00226         }
00227 
00228         for (ForeignKeyConstraint fkConstraint : getForeignKeyConstraints()) {
00229             buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ")
00230                     .append(database.escapeConstraintName(fkConstraint.getForeignKeyName()))
00231                     .append(" FOREIGN KEY (")
00232                     .append(database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), fkConstraint.getColumn()))
00233                     .append(") REFERENCES ")
00234                     .append(fkConstraint.getReferences());
00235 
00236             if (fkConstraint.isDeleteCascade()) {
00237                 buffer.append(" ON DELETE CASCADE");
00238             }
00239 
00240 
00241             if (fkConstraint.isInitiallyDeferred()) {
00242                 buffer.append(" INITIALLY DEFERRED");
00243             }
00244             if (fkConstraint.isDeferrable()) {
00245                 buffer.append(" DEFERRABLE");
00246             }
00247             buffer.append(",");
00248         }
00249 
00250         for (UniqueConstraint uniqueConstraint : getUniqueConstraints()) {
00251             if (uniqueConstraint.getConstraintName() != null) {
00252                 buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ");
00253                 buffer.append(database.escapeConstraintName(uniqueConstraint.getConstraintName()));
00254             }
00255             buffer.append(" UNIQUE (");
00256             buffer.append(database.escapeColumnNameList(StringUtils.join(uniqueConstraint.getColumns(), ", ")));
00257             buffer.append("),");
00258         }
00259 
00260 //        if (constraints != null && constraints.getCheck() != null) {
00261 //            buffer.append(constraints.getCheck()).append(" ");
00262 //        }
00263 //    }
00264 
00265         String sql = buffer.toString().replaceFirst(",\\s*$", "") + ")";
00266 
00267 //        if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tablespace) != null && database.supportsTablespaces()) {
00268 //            if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00269 //                buffer.append(" ON ").append(tablespace);
00270 //            } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00271 //                buffer.append(" IN ").append(tablespace);
00272 //            } else {
00273 //                buffer.append(" TABLESPACE ").append(tablespace);
00274 //            }
00275 //        }
00276 
00277         if (getTablespace() != null && database.supportsTablespaces()) {
00278             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00279                 sql += " ON " + getTablespace();
00280             } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00281                 sql += " IN " + getTablespace();
00282             } else {
00283                 sql += " TABLESPACE " + getTablespace();
00284             }
00285         }
00286         return sql;
00287     }
00288 
00289     public String getDefaultValue(String column) {
00290         return defaultValues.get(column);
00291     }
00292 
00293     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00294         return ";";
00295     }
00296 
00297     public CreateTableStatement addColumnConstraint(NotNullConstraint notNullConstraint) {
00298         getNotNullColumns().add(notNullConstraint.getColumnName());
00299         return this;
00300     }
00301 
00302     public CreateTableStatement addColumnConstraint(ForeignKeyConstraint fkConstraint) {
00303         getForeignKeyConstraints().add(fkConstraint);
00304         return this;
00305     }
00306 
00307     public CreateTableStatement addColumnConstraint(UniqueConstraint uniqueConstraint) {
00308         getUniqueConstraints().add(uniqueConstraint);
00309         return this;
00310     }
00311 
00312     public CreateTableStatement addColumnConstraint(AutoIncrementConstraint autoIncrementConstraint) {
00313         autoIncrementColumns.add(autoIncrementConstraint.getColumnName());
00314         return this;
00315     }
